short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A place to secure your passwords with a peace of mind

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Password Shield is used to save your website passwords securely in the database. Please follow the GitHub repository readme steps on how to establish the database server and install the server sided source files to make the password extension compatible with the database.
https://github.com/Scorpio-170/PasswordShield
